duties_responsibilities.duty: Promote the game of golf and the Club while providing quality service to Members and guests.
Accurately ring up charges at the register and check in all golfers prior to play.
Respond to inquiries and make tee times for Members and guests both in-person and over the phone.
Responsible for inventory controls, merchandise check-in, and organization of storage and display areas.
Provide shop assistance to the Head Golf Professional, General Manager, and Tournament Coordinators.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, or equivalent
